description: Doktor Krishan Chug Osiyoning eng yaxshi pediatrlaridan biri va bolalar pulmonologiyasi va allergiyasi sohasida faol ishlagan birinchi hind pediatrlaridan biri
U bolalar va neonatal bronkoskopiya bo'yicha katta tajribaga ega va Hindistondagi bolalarda interventsion bronkoskopiya bo'yicha kashshof hisoblanadi.
Doktor Chug FMRIda bolalar bronkoskopiyasi bo'yicha yillik seminar o'tkazadi.
U 1982 yilda Nyu-Dehlidagi Lady Harding tibbiyot kolleji, Kalavati Saran bolalar kasalxonasida mamlakatdagi birinchi bolalar intensiv terapiya bo'limini (PICU) boshlagan.
Keyinchalik u Hindistondagi xususiy sektorda birinchi PICUni Nyu-Dehlidagi Sir Ganga Ram kasalxonasida tashkil qildi.
Hozirda u FMRIda PICUga rahbarlik qiladi va Gurgaon va Dehli NCR mintaqasidagi eng yaxshi bolalar mutaxassislaridan biri hisoblanadi.
Doktor Chug yosh pediatrlarni o'qitish va o'qitishga ishtiyoqi bor, ularning ko'pchiligi hozirda o'z shaharlari va shaharlarida PICUlarni muvaffaqiyatli boshqarmoqda
Uning ifloslanish, deng va cho'chqa grippi kabi bolalar salomatligi muammolari haqidagi fikrlari ommaviy axborot vositalarida juda qiziq.
O'zining ilmiy yutuqlari e'tirofi sifatida u Hindistonning yirik pediatriya jurnallarining tahririyat kengashiga taklif qilindi.

U ilmiy nashrlar uchun ko'p yozadi va Pediatriya, Pediatrik ilg'or hayotni qo'llab-quvvatlash (PALS), Bolalar pulmonologiyasi va bolalarning jiddiy tibbiy yordami bo'yicha bir nechta seminarlar va kurslar direktori bo'lgan.
U turli milliy va xalqaro konferentsiyalarda ma'ruza va nutq so'zlash uchun taklif qilingan.
Hozirda u Hindiston Pediatriya kolleji dekani va Pediatriya jiddiy tibbiy yordam kolleji rektori.
U bir nechta kitoblarni tahrir qilgan va boshqa ko'plab kitoblarga bo'limlar qo'shgan.

d29.name: Dr. Rahul Bhargava
description: Doktor Rahul Bhargava o'z sayohatini 2010 yilda Medantadagi ildiz hujayra transplantatsiyasida boshlagan va shu kungacha 1500 dan ortiq transplantatsiyani amalga oshirgan.
U Hindiston bo'ylab 10 ta arzon markazlarni, shu jumladan Sarvodaya kasalxonasi, Batra kasalxonasi va Action Balaji kasalxonasini tashkil etganligi bilan ajralib turadi.
Doktor Bhargava kamqonlik va talassemiyadan xoli Hindistonni ko'rish uchun arzon narxlardagi BMTni davolash uchun turli hukumat tashabbuslari bilan faol hamkorlik qiladi.

Uning gematologiya, bolalar gematologiyasi va ildiz hujayra transplantatsiyasi bo'yicha birinchi integratsiyalashgan mukammallik markazini yaratish haqidagi tasavvuri Fortis Memorial tadqiqot institutida amalga oshirildi.
2016 yilda u ko'p sklerozda ildiz hujayra transplantatsiyasini amalga oshirgan va ommalashtirgan birinchi hind shifokori bo'ldi.
Doktor Bhargava Dehli va Gurgaondagi ildiz hujayra transplantatsiyasi bo'yicha eng yaxshi mutaxassislardan biri hisoblanadi.
2018 yilda u jamoa gematologiyasiga bo'lgan qiziqishi tufayli Haryana va uning atrofidagi maktablarda 500 dan ortiq bolalarni skriningdan o'tkazdi.

U 1000 dan ortiq CME dasturlarini tamomlagan va turli qon kasalliklari haqida xabardorlikni oshirishda faol ishtirok etmoqda, Dehli va Gurgaondagi eng yaxshi gematologlardan biri sifatida tan olingan.

d30.name: Dr Vikas Dua
description: Doktor Vikas Dua - taniqli bolalar gemato-onkologi va suyak iligi transplantatsiyasi bo'yicha mutaxassis.
U va uning jamoasi 1000 dan ortiq transplantatsiyani amalga oshirib, bolalar gematologiyasi onkologiyasi va BMT bo'yicha eng yaxshi natijalarga erishdi.
Doktor Dua ildiz hujayra transplantatsiyasi, xususan, bolalarga aloqasi bo'lmagan va haploidentsial transplantatsiya bo'yicha o'zining ajoyib natijalari bilan mashhur.
U Hindistonda hech kim amalga oshirmagan juda kam uchraydigan transplantatsiya operatsiyalarini amalga oshirdi.
Uning alohida qiziqishlari orasida benign pediatrik gematologiya, gemato-onkologiya va bir-biriga mos keladigan aka-uka va bog'liq bo'lmagan bolalarning haploidentsial transplantatsiyasi kiradi.

d31.name: Dr. Vinod Raina
d31.education: MBBS, MD (AIIMS), MRCP (Buyuk Britaniya), FRCP (Edinburg va London), FAMS
speciality: Suyak iligi va ildiz hujayra transplantatsiyasi
description: Doktor Vinod Raina 40 yildan ortiq tajribaga ega Hindistonning eng yirik tibbiy onkologlaridan biridir.
U Nyu-Dehli shahridagi Butun Hindiston tibbiyot fanlari institutida (AIIMS) professor va tibbiy onkologiya bo'limi boshlig'i bo'lib ishlagan.
Doktor Raina ko'krak, o'pka, oshqozon-ichak, urologik, ginekologik, limfoma va miyeloma kabi turli xil saraton kasalliklarida maxsus tajribaga ega.
U shaxsan turli xil saraton kasalliklari uchun 400 ga yaqin suyak iligi / ildiz hujayra transplantatsiyasini amalga oshirdi.
Doktor Raina 24 yil davomida AIIMSda 50 ga yaqin loyihaning bosh tadqiqotchisi bo'lgan katta tadqiqot tajribasini olib keladi.
U INDOX tarmog'iga asos solgan va 70 ga yaqin rezidentlar va DM talabalariga murabbiylik qilgan, ularning aksariyati Hindiston va xorijda yetakchi lavozimlarni egallagan.

U 2013 yilda tibbiy onkologiya va gematologiya direktori va rahbari sifatida FMRIga qo'shildi, 2017 yilda ijrochi direktor lavozimiga ko'tarildi va 2020 yil yanvar oyida Oncosciences - Fortis Healthcare raisi bo'ldi.

d32.name: Dr Udgeath Dhir
description: Doktor Udgeat Dhir o'zining o'n bir yillik faoliyati davomida 7500 dan ortiq holatda operatsiya qilgan.
U rasmiy ravishda doktor Taweseeak tomonidan Bangkokdagi Markaziy Ko'krak Institutida revmatik mitral qopqoqni ta'mirlash bo'yicha o'qitilgan va yaqinda TAVI uchun o'qitilgan.
Doktor Dhir Escorts Heart Institute & Research Centre, Nyu-Dehli bilan hamkorlik qilgan va oxirgi marta Gurgaon shahridagi Medanta-The Medicity kompaniyasida katta maslahatchi bo'lgan.

U bir qancha nufuzli assotsiatsiyalar, jumladan Torakal jarrohlar jamiyati (STS), Evropa kardio-torakal jarrohlar uyushmasi (EACTS) va Xalqaro minimal invaziv yurak jarrohligi jamiyati (ISMICS) a'zosi.
Doktor Dhir etakchi jurnallarda maqolalar chop etgan va kardiojarrohlik darsliklarida bo'limlar muallifi.
U Xalqaro koronar kongressda eng yaxshi ma'ruza taqdimoti bilan taqdirlangan.

U Gurugram Fortis Memorial tadqiqot institutida KBB direktori bo'lib, u erda o'z amaliyoti va xodimlarini samarali boshqaradi.
Doktor Mittal har yili 800 dan ortiq operatsiyalarni amalga oshiradi, bu Otorinolaringologiyaning butun davomiyligini qamrab oladi.
Uning tajriba sohalari orasida minimal kirish endoskopik sinus va bosh suyagi jarrohligi, balonli sinoplastiya, endoskopik adenoidektomiya va uyqu jarrohligi kiradi.
U shuningdek, qalqonsimon bez va laringeal operatsiyalarni amalga oshiradi, koxlear implantatsiya qiladi va allergik nafas olish kasalliklari uchun immunoterapiya beradi.
Doktor Mittal milliy va xalqaro jurnallarda ko'plab nashrlarga ega va konferentsiyalar va CMElarda faol ishtirok etadi.

d34.post: OTA DIREKTOR VA BIRLIK ORTOPEDIYA BOSHLIGI
description: Doktor Subhash Jangid, Gurgaon shahridagi Fortis Memorial tadqiqot institutining ortopediya va qo'shma rekonstruksiya bo'limi direktori.
U ortopediyada 22 yildan ortiq tajribaga ega bo'lib, tizza, son va elka bo'g'imlari operatsiyalariga, shu jumladan almashtirishlarga e'tibor qaratadi.
Doktor Jangid - Hindistonda ham, chet elda ham artroplastika/bo'g'imlarni almashtirish bo'yicha taniqli fakultet, shuningdek, AO travma kurslari uchun fakultetdir.

Doktor Jangid an'anaviy usullar bilan solishtirganda bemorning yaxshi natijalarini va tezroq tiklanishini ta'minlaydigan kompyuter navigatsiya texnikasidan foydalangan holda dunyodagi eng tajribali bo'g'imlarni almashtirish jarrohlaridan biridir.

U Buyuk Britaniyada 10 yil davomida Lids va Sheffild universitetlarining turli ortopediya bo'limlarida ishlagan, u erda Glazgodagi Qirollik shifokorlar va jarrohlar kollejida (FRCS) stipendiya olgan va travma va ortopediya bo'yicha kollejlararo imtihonlarni topshirgan ( FRCS Tr & Orth) 2008 yilda.

Buyuk Britaniyada o'qish davomida doktor Padman artroplastikada qo'llaniladigan polietilenga biologik reaktsiyalar bo'yicha asosiy tadqiqotlar o'tkazdi va 2004 yilda Lids universitetida tadqiqot magistri darajasini oldi.

U Sheffild bolalar kasalxonasida bolalar ortopediyasi bo'yicha milliy a'zo sifatida tahsil oldi va 2009 yil iyun oyida Hindistonga qaytishdan oldin bolalar ortopediyasi bo'yicha maslahatchi bo'lib ishladi.

20 yillik tajribasi bilan u Sheffild bolalar kasalxonasi, Maks Healthcare va Fortis Memorial tadqiqot instituti kabi taniqli muassasalar bilan hamkorlik qilgan va u erda bolalar ortopediyasi va travma jarrohligi bo'yicha katta maslahatchi bo'lib ishlagan.

description: Doktor Praveen Chandra - etakchi hind kardiologi va Medanta - The Medicity, Gurgaon, Hindistonning interventional kardiologiya bo'limi raisi.
U Hindistonda angioplastika bo'yicha etakchilardan biri sifatida tan olingan va turli xil yangi qurilmalar va texnologiyalarni yaxshi biladi.
Doktor Chandra 2016-yilda tibbiyot sohasidagi muvaffaqiyati va muvaffaqiyati uchun Hindiston Prezidenti tomonidan Padma Shri bilan taqdirlangan.
U Max Healthcare'da Cardiac Cath Lab & Acute MI Services direktori va Escorts Heart Institute va Research Center, Nyu-Dehlida maslahatchi kardiolog bo'lib ishlagan.
U Hindiston endovaskulyar aralashuv jamiyati va Osiyo-Tinch okeani interventsion kardiologiya jamiyati a'zosi.

U turli milliy va xalqaro jurnallarda 100 ga yaqin maqolalar, sharhlar va tezislar chop etgan.
U Hindistonda birinchi teri orqali aorta qopqog'ini implantatsiyasi va teri orqali mitral qopqoqni ta'mirlashni amalga oshirdi.

Shuningdek, u birinchi bo'lib Angio Jet trombektomiya qurilmasidan foydalangan, Osiyoda teri orqali miyokard lazerli tomirizatsiya dasturini boshlagan va Hindistonda FFR va bioabsorbable stentlardan foydalangan.

d44.name: Dr Ashok Rajgopal
description: Tizza almashtirish jarrohligidagi kashshof yutuqlari bilan xalqaro miqyosda mashhur.
39 000 dan ortiq umumiy tizzani almashtirish operatsiyalari va sport jarohatlari uchun 60 000 dan ortiq artroskopik operatsiyalarni amalga oshirdi.
Birinchi bo'lib Hindistonda ikki tomonlama to'liq tizzani almashtirish operatsiyasi amalga oshirildi.
Birinchi navbatda Hindistonda minimal invaziv to'liq tizzani almashtirish operatsiyasini o'tkazish, tiklanish vaqtlari va natijalarini sezilarli darajada yaxshilaydi.
Bemorga xos asbob-uskunalar yordamida tizzani virtual to'liq almashtirish jarrohligi bo'yicha innovator, tekislash va funksionallikning aniqligini oshiradi.
Birinchi navbatda Hindistonda erkaklar va ayollar o'rtasidagi anatomik farqlarga moslashtirilgan jinsga xos tizza implantlaridan foydalanish.
Minimal invaziv tizzalarni almashtirish operatsiyalari uchun ishlab chiqilgan va ishlab chiqilgan patentlangan asboblar hozirda butun dunyo bo'ylab jarrohlar tomonidan keng qo'llaniladi.
2013 yilda Hindistonda ishga tushirilgan inqilobiy implant tizimi Zimmer tomonidan ishlab chiqilgan Persona tizza tizimini loyihalash guruhi a'zosi.
12 soatdan kamroq vaqt ichida 28 ta to'liq tizzani almashtirish operatsiyasini bajarish bosqichiga erishdi.
O'ttiz yillik amaliyotda 25 000 ta tizzani almashtirish operatsiyalariga erishildi, bu ajoyib mahorat va fidoyilikni namoyish etdi.
Trabekulyar metall implantlari kabi ilg'or tsementsiz implantlar bo'yicha mutaxassis, o'zining yuqori kuch-og'irlik nisbati va tabiiy suyakka o'xshash mexanik xususiyatlari bilan mashhur.
Aniq jarrohlik natijalari uchun ilg'or texnologiyalarni qo'llagan holda, virtual to'liq tizzani almashtirishdan foydalanishga kashshof bo'ldi.
Xalqaro panellar va qo'mitalarning faol a'zosi tizzalarni almashtirish texnologiyasi va usullarini rivojlantirishga qaratilgan.

Etikon Jarrohlik Ta'limi Instituti (EISE), Nyu-Dehli) murabbiyi va o'qituvchisi.
Artemis kasalxonalarida o'qituvchilik fakulteti, umumiy jarrohlik bo'yicha DNB aspirantlarini tayyorlash va o'qitish bilan shug'ullanadi.
2018 yildan boshlab FNBda (Minimal kirish jarrohligi) Super Mutaxassislik o'qitish dasturini boshlash uchun Milliy Kengashning roziligini olishda vosita.
FIAGES fakulteti (Hindiston gastro-endoskopik jarrohlar uyushmasi stipendiyasi).
description: Doktor Paritosh S Gupta Artemis kasalxonalarida umumiy, minimal kirish va bariatrik jarrohlik bo'limi boshlig'i, Gurgaon, Hindiston.
U 2012 yil dekabr oyida Artemis kasalxonalariga katta maslahatchi sifatida qo'shildi va keyinchalik bo'lim boshlig'i lavozimiga ko'tarildi.

Ilgari u Hindiston o'murtqa jarohatlar markazi va Nova maxsus jarrohligida umumiy jarrohlik va minimal kirish jarrohligi bo'limi boshlig'i va Kolumbiya Osiyo kasalxonasi GBDda bo'lim boshlig'i lavozimlarida ishlagan.
U Saket Maks Super ixtisoslashtirilgan kasalxonasida va Vasant Kunj Fortis kasalxonasida Umumiy jarrohlik va minimal kirish jarrohlik bo'limida katta maslahatchi bo'lib ishlagan.
Doktor Gupta Dehli va NCRda 17 yildan ortiq tajribaga ega.
U 14000 dan ortiq muvaffaqiyatli operatsiyalarni amalga oshirib, qorin bo'shlig'i va oshqozon-ichak operatsiyalari bo'yicha o'zining katta tajribasini namoyish etdi.

Doktor Gupta Jamnagar, Gujarat shtatidagi Sh.MP Shah tibbiyot kollejini tamomlagan va shu yerda magistratura darajasini (Gen jarrohlik) tamomlagan. U Milliy kengash (DNB, Gen jarrohlik) kengashi tomonidan sertifikatlangan jarrohdir.
U Milliy Tibbiyot fanlari akademiyasining a'zoligiga ega va IIM Kalkutta bitiruvchisi bo'lib, u erda 2016 yilda Leadership & Management Executive dasturini tamomlagan.
U umumiy jarrohlik sohasiga qo'shgan hissasi uchun AMASI va FAIS (Hindiston jarrohlar uyushmasi) tomonidan FMAS (Fellow Minimal Access Surgery) bilan taqdirlangan.
Doktor Gupta Etikon Jarrohlik Ta'limi Institutida (EISE) trener va o'qituvchi bo'lib, qattiq organ laparoskopik jarrohlik bo'yicha ko'plab jarrohlarni tayyorlagan.

U, shuningdek, Artemis kasalxonalarida o'qituvchi bo'lib, umumiy jarrohlik bo'yicha DNB aspirantura talabalarini tayyorlash va o'qitish bilan shug'ullanadi va FNB (Minimal Access Surgery) dasturini yaratishga yordam berdi.
Doktor Gupta turli qo'mitalar, jumladan, buyrak transplantatsiyasi va infektsiyani nazorat qilish qo'mitalarining faol a'zosi bo'lib, operatsiya teatrlarining samarali ishlashiga hissa qo'shgan.

description: Dr. Krishna Iyer is a leading pediatric cardiac surgeon in India, known for his extensive experience and contributions to cardiac care for children.

He initiated the first dedicated pediatric cardiac care program in Northern India at Escorts Heart Institute Research Centre (now Fortis-Escorts Heart Institute), which has become a benchmark for cardiac care in India and Southeast Asia.

Dr. Iyer has performed over 10,000 surgeries on babies, children, and adults with congenital heart diseases, including complex procedures such as arterial switch procedures, double switch operations, TAPVC repairs, and Fontan procedures.
He is noted for his pioneering work on the rapid two-stage arterial switch procedure and performed the first successful rapid two-stage arterial switch and double-switch operation in India.

His current interests include perfecting complex neonatal cardiac surgery, addressing cardiac surgery in malnourished infants and children, salvaging late presenters of congenital heart disease, and developing cost-effective cardiac care solutions for developing countries.

Dr. Iyer trained in pediatric and infant cardiac surgery under Dr. R.B.B. Mee at the Royal Children's Hospital, Melbourne, Australia, and has held positions including Additional Professor at AIIMS before establishing the pediatric cardiac care division at Escorts Heart Institute.
He is also involved in charitable activities, notably the 'Gift of Life' program of Rotary International.

Expertise in treating brain and spine disorders, including Degenerative Spine Disorders, Brain Tumors, Disc Replacements, and Pediatric Neurosurgeries.
Previously served as Head of Neurosurgery at Artemis Hospital, Gurgaon.
Performed more than 8,000 successful surgeries.

d101.name: Dr. Hemant Sharma
d101.post: Chairman - Dept. of Trauma & Orthopedics & Joint Replacement

Specialist training accumulated through fellowships in the UK.
Regular attendance as both delegate and faculty member at national and international meetings.

work: Director and Head of the Department of Trauma and Orthopaedics at Marengo Asia Hospitals, Gurugram (formerly W Pratiksha Hospital, Gurugram).
Significantly contributed to the hospital's recognition as a center of excellence for robotic orthopedic surgery and sports injury treatment.
description: Over 26 years of experience in orthopedics (11 years in India and 11 years in England).
Certified Fellow by the Royal College of Surgeons of England.
Specializes in robotic, hip, and knee surgery.
Expert in complex trauma and elective orthopedic surgeries.
Renowned for proficiency in revision trauma and revision arthroplasty surgery.
Special interest in young adult hips, developmental dysplasia of the hip (DDH), sickle cell disease, joint preservation surgery for the knee, and sports injuries of the hip and knee.

d102.name: Dr. Rajesh Verma
training: AO Fellowship Trauma, Denver, USA
Fellowship Spine Surgery Seoul, South Korea
work: Performs a high volume of complex spine surgeries and innovative procedures.
Active in teaching and delivering lectures at national and international platforms.
description: 29 years of experience in treating spinal disorders.
Recognized for dedication and commitment to complex bone, joint, and spine disorders.

Specializes in percutaneous spine surgeries including Kyphoplasty, Disc Excisions using Joimax TESSY system, Nucleoplasty, SpineJet Hydrodiscectomy, and pain management with radiofrequency techniques.
Has performed over 15,000 surgeries out of more than 24,000 surgical cases, including spine surgeries, joint replacements, pediatric orthopedics, and complex trauma surgeries.
One of the leading spine experts in India, performing approximately 50 surgeries per month.
Specializes in motion preservation and dynamic spine surgeries as alternatives to spine fusions.
Teaching faculty for postgraduate students and has delivered lectures on national and international platforms.

description: Dr. Giriraj Singh Bora is a Gastroenterologist, Gastrointestinal Surgeon, and General Surgeon with 22 years of experience.
He specializes in HPB (Hepato-Pancreato-Biliary) Surgery, Liver Disease Treatment, Liver Transplantation, and GI Surgery procedures.
He has extensive experience in managing complex gastrointestinal conditions and performing advanced surgical interventions.

Indraprastha Apollo Hospitals, New Delhi, 2006 till 2016
Sir Ganga Ram Hospital, New Delhi, 1998 - 2006

Queen’s Elizabeth Medical Centre, Birmingham, 1993 to 1995
All India Institute of Medical Sciences, 1981 to  1993
description: Dr. Subhash Gupta is the Chairman of the Max Centre for Liver and Biliary Sciences, one of the largest liver transplant centers globally.
The Centre, under his leadership, has conducted over 3000 transplants and performs more than 200 transplants annually, along with numerous complex HPB cases.
Dr. Gupta is responsible for ensuring safety protocols across all divisions of the Centre, including Hepatology, Anaesthesia, and Critical Care.
He joined Max Healthcare in January 2017 and brings over 30 years of expertise in Surgical Gastroenterology, Liver Transplantation, and Hepatopancreaticobiliary Oncology.

d105.name: Dr. (Col) Manjinder Sandhu
training: MBBS from Armed Forces Medical College, 1986
MD (Medicine) from Pune University, Gold Medalist, 1993
DNB (Medicine), 1993
DM (Cardiology) from PGIMER, Chandigarh, 2001
d105.education: MBBS, MD - General Medicine, DNB - General Medicine, DM - Cardiology
work: Director-Cardiology and Medical Director at Artemis Hospital since July 2011
Former Senior Adviser (Medicine and Cardiology) at Base Hospital, Delhi Cantt
Former Additional Professor of Medicine and Cardiology at Army College of Medical Sciences, Delhi Cantt
Mentor for medical informatics and medical services with the Executive Director at Artemis Hospital
description: Dr. (Col) Manjinder Sandhu is a renowned interventional cardiologist with over 35 years of experience.

He has independently performed over 20,000 procedures, specializing in complex coronary interventions such as primary angioplasty, bifurcation lesions, chronic total occlusions, and left main lesions.
Dr. Sandhu is proficient in using adjunctive devices like cutting balloons, angiosculpt, IVUS, and Rotablation, primarily performing procedures via the radial route.
He had a distinguished career in the Indian Army Medical Corps and was honored as the accompanying cardiologist to the President of India on tours.
He is a fellow of the American College of Cardiology and the Society for Cardiac Angiography and Interventions.
Dr. Sandhu has authored numerous academic papers, presented at national and international conferences, and is a recipient of many national awards.
He has recently completed his Masters in Health Administration from Walden University, USA.

description: Dr. Sanjay Gogoi has over 25 years of experience in Comprehensive Urology Practice.
He specializes in complex and challenging Urological procedures, including Renal Transplant, Uro-Oncology, and Reconstructive Surgeries.
Dr. Gogoi is committed to providing ethical, evidence-based medicine.
His dedication to tackling difficult cases and delivering optimal outcomes has earned recognition from both peers and patients.

d107.name: Dr. Sudhir Dubey

work: Performed more than 10,000 neurosurgical operations, including Pituitary Surgery.
Pioneered Endoscopic and Minimally Invasive Surgery for Brain, Skull Base, and Spine Surgery.
description: Dr. Sudhir Dubey is recognized for his extensive experience in neurosurgery and pioneering minimally invasive techniques.
He has been awarded the 'Young Neurosurgeon's Award' by the World Federation of Neurosurgical Societies, a distinction unique to India.
His innovative work in brain tumor surgery has gained international acclaim.

description: Dr. Kulbhushan S. Dagar has over 21 years of experience in cardiac surgery, with the last 15 years focusing on congenital heart defects in infants and children.
He is skilled in performing complex congenital cardiac surgeries and uses innovative techniques and cutting-edge technologies.

Dr. Dagar has received formal training at GB Pant Hospital, New Delhi, and distinguished himself at Great Ormond Street Hospital for Sick Children in London, where he was trained in Extra Corporeal Life Support and Heart Transplant techniques.
